'''2.4.30''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on April 12, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Improvements to image caching in some places of the Launcher in offline mode.
* Work to increase update & installation reliability.

== Fixes ==
* Functionality, interaction improvements & bug fixes.
* MacOS distribution bug fixes.
* {{bug|MCL-23141}} - Skin library does not refresh the preview whenever you change the cape
* {{bug|MCL-23127}} - Minecraft Legends GameIntroduction string contains a typo
* {{bug|MCL-23126}} - Minecraft Legends GameIntroduction string contains grammatical errors</onlyinclude>
